data.meta_description: At Smoky Mountain Title, we strive to provide superior real estate, title, escrow and closing services to Sevierville, Gatlinburg & Pigeon Forge.
data.text:
At Smoky Mountain Title, we strive to consistently provide superior real estate, title, escrow, and closing services, all in a friendly and relaxed atmosphere. Our staff offer many decades of real estate closing experience, and our closings are conducted by attorneys specializing solely in real estate law. Since we rarely charge for our services unless the transaction closes, we understand the importance of actually closing the deal.

Our real estate lawyers and staff offer real estate, title insurance and escrow services to most of East Tennessee. We provide title insurance directly or through affiliated companies through Fidelity, Lawyers, Chicago, Southern, and Commonwealth Title Insurance Companies.
